alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 6:56PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Golden Valley County through 745 PM MDT... At 654 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ryegate, or 30 miles west of Roundup, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall. Rainfall rates 2 to 4 inches per hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized ponding or flooding. Be prepared for reduced visibility in heavy rainfall. Locations impacted include... Ryegate and Franklin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
